summary: Based on the provided documents, there is no mention of Joe Crane. The documents primarily focus on Richard Case Nagell and his threats to expose contacts with an organization referred to as 'WOFIRM' if promises made by US officials were not honored. The documents also discuss procedures for handling Office of Security files related to Nagell and ensuring the protection of sensitive information reviewed by the House Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA). Therefore, no information about Joe Crane can be extracted from these documents.
significance: Based on the provided documents, Joe Crane has no significance in the JFK context.
